basics.name: Ishikaa Lunawat
basics.label: Master's Student at Stanford University
basics.summary: Creative and detail-oriented graduate student with 2+ years experience in machine learning, computer vision, and robotics research. Published in top conferences on 3D geometric reconstruction and domain adaptation. Skilled in Python and Deep Learning frameworks (OpenCV, PyTorch, TensorFlow), with a record of independent task execution and effective communication in both academic and industry settings

courses: Machine Learning with Graph Neural Networks

experience.name: Omnyk Inc.
experience.summary: Implemented squeeze-and-excite blocks and achieved 73% accuracy on sleep-stage classification using interbeat intervaldata for human heart score prediction. Performed sleep quality analysis for 10+ patients and created heart health reports with visualizations for patientsdiagnosed with cardiovascular problems
